name: Zombify
desc: Create a Zombie on a tile in the same rank.

name: Demonize
desc: Create a Lesser Demon on a tile in the same rank.

name: Induce Frenzy
desc: Target player reveals the top card of their deck. You may have them play that card, choosing targets for them if necessary. Those targets may be any target. Otherwise, they discard that card.

name: Grasp of the Void
desc: Move target player up to 2 squares in any direction. They take 4 Necrotic damage.
